text: Ricardo Ramos (born 5 December 1985) is a Mexican long-distance runner. At the 2016 Summer Olympics, he competed in the marathon, finishing in 120th place in just his third marathon. Ramos took up long-distance running aged 19 to improve his health. He is married and has three children. He serves with the Mexican Army. ==Personal Bests== *5000m - 14:27.19 (2016) *10000m - 29:35.85 (2016) *Half Marathon - 1:05.00 (2016) *Marathon - 2:14.58 (2016) ==References== Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Mexican male long-distance runners Category:Mexican male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Mexico Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: Ricardo Ramos (athlete)
